tool_description: Validates customer profile data against schema requirements, business rules, and data quality standards before processing.

phone_number.description: Customer phone number in international format

date_of_birth.description: Customer date of birth in ISO 8601 format

error_messages: Invalid email format: Provide a valid email address format (user@domain.com).
Invalid phone number: Provide phone number in international format (+1234567890).
Name validation failed: First name and last name must be 1-50 characters, letters only.
Invalid date of birth: Provide date in ISO 8601 format and ensure customer is at least 13 years old.
Missing required fields: Email, first_name, and last_name are mandatory.
usage: Provide customer data fields to validate. The tool checks format, length, and business rule compliance before profile creation or updates.

validation_errors.description: List of validation error messages if any

validated_data.description: JSON string of cleaned and validated profile data
